title: Clear Noon, Moderate-Speed City Driving with 30 Braking Events

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, following the flow of traffic. It slows down and stops at red traffic lights or stop signs, and it changes lanes or turns when it is safe to do so. The driver is cautious and attentive, constantly scanning the surroundings for any potential risks or obstacles. The 30 braking events in this window could be due to the traffic situation or the need to stop at traffic lights or stop signs.
